title: hess monoblack
content: is there anyone who can help me track down a full(ish) showing of this face? any leads would be appreciated. thnx.
author: paul d hunt

comments.content: Paul, I think the font you seek may be Hess Neobold, Mono and it is shown (Caps, Numbers and some Punc. only) on page 178 of Mac McGrew's American Metal Typefaces of the 20th Century, Oak Knoll Books 1993 2ed.

no, not neobold. monoblack is also in the McGrew book, just above neobold and is a completely different design. i have some partial settings, but want to find more complete character sets if possible.
